name: ZOSU VR Explosive Bow Hunting
description:
Casual VR hunting game with exploding arrow, hunt invading animals while experiencing beautiful HD forests, islands, and cities.
- Over 10 levels totaling over 3 square miles to explore across hilltops, islands, castles, and dense forests
- Hunt animals, that are really alien invaders, with exploding arrows (explode in a cartoonish way)
- Explore various detailed forests, islands and castles
- Over 25 types of animals to hunt
- Over 100 unique pieces of vegetation used
- Various weather and day and night cycles depending on the level, including snow and rain
- There are a variety of levels with some having very dense forests and no tree climbing, other with simplified tree climbing (invisible cylinder trunk approximation for climbing), and others with full branch climbing
- Climb almost any building
- Variable scoring depending on animal and shot. Explosions are calculated and not pre-animated.
- The Story: animals from space have invaded ZOSULand and disguised themselves as normal animals. All normal animals are gone. Destroy the animal invaders with exploding arrows. Obtain the highest score you can on each level.
